additionalPlain:
Education;
Degree or Masters in relevant field of engineering from reputed university (BE/BTech/Mtech)


Parallel Wireless is the leading U.S.-based company challenging the world’s legacy vendors with the industry’s only unified ALL G (5G/4G/3G/2G) software-enabled OpenRAN solutions. Its cloud-native OpenRAN and network architectures redefine network economics for global mobile operators in both coverage and capacity deployments, while also paving the way to 5G. Through open collaboration with the OpenRAN ecosystem partners, Parallel Wireless has created the world’s first and largest fully-compliant OpenRAN ecosystem that is capable of delivering next generation wireless infrastructure at a dramatically lower cost, ensuring more equal access to 5G across the globe. The company’s OpenRAN portfolio is designed to help customers modernize their networks, reduce deployment costs and complexity, increase operational efficiency, enable interoperability, find new revenue streams, and start deploying multi-vendor 5G networks today. The company’s customers include over 60 global mobile operators, as well as private and public industries and governments that use their software-defined network portfolio to reimagine their networks. Parallel Wireless's innovation and excellence in multi-technology, open virtualized RAN solutions have been recognized with 65+ industry awards. Please visit www.parallelwireless.com for more information.
 
Parallel Wireless embraces diversity and equality of opportunity. We are committed to building inclusive and diverse teams representing all backgrounds, with a wide range of perspectives, and empowering industry-leading skills. We welcome and consider applications to join our team from all qualified candidates, regardless of their characteristics. We comply with all applicable laws and regulations on non-discrimination in employment (and recruitment), as well as work authorization and employment eligibility verification requirements.
 
Parallel Wireless does not accept unsolicited resumes or applications from agencies or individuals. Please do not forward resumes to our jobs alias, Parallel Wireless employees or any other company location. Parallel Wireless is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes/applications.

descriptionPlain:
People come to work at Parallel Wireless because we are building the future of telecom. They stay, because they are challenged and driven by an incredible product and team.  We take pride in our commitment to employee development, and our culture fosters an atmosphere of empowerment, trust, respect, and communication. Learn more about our mission, vision and values.

What you'll do:
2G QA Access 
BTS/BSC/MSC testing (GSM) experience-  functional , performance, stress Testing
Well understanding about GPRS/EGPRS-PS call flow and Tput testing..
Well understanding & working knowledge on E2E CS call flow and should worked on EFR/FR/HR and      diff supported voice codec. 
Hand-on experience on intra/inter BTS HO. 
Debugging issue on MAC/RRC  and knowledge on other stack layer will add advantage.
Should have working exp on GSM  features (DL-UL Power control/FH/Handover/IRAT HO/CSFB).
Validating various protocols over all the interfaces, creating test requirements, test plans,      and detailed test procedures
Performing test activities and troubleshooting software and hardware issues as well the      customer’s issues
Use knowledge of LAN/WAN, Routing protocols, TCP/IP, QoS, Tunnelling and security      protocols
Utilize expertise in translating standards, feature documents and customer requirements into      system level, subsystem level and feature level test plans and test cases
Troubleshoot issues and get into technical discussions with R&D
Utilize experience in hands-on system integration and testing
Utilize expert knowledge in various protocols for interoperability, performance evaluation and troubleshooting      issue

 2- 10 years of experience in radio access technology (GSM is must and preferred - candidate must have 2G working experience at present).

lists.content:
• Work on cutting-edge cellular technology, Design and implement digital processing SW modules in the baseband modem. Implementing O-RAN standard functionality.
  • The role will involve active participation in the design, development, and validation of 5G Physical Layer Radio Access Network technologies.

• At least 5 years’ experience of Software Development
  • A good working knowledge of C and C ++ at least 2 years of experience
  • Experience in wireless communication systems
  • Strong real time software development experience
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills
  • Must be able to multitask and prioritize work
  • Positive attitude and professional demeanor

• Communication algorithm/DSP implementation
  • Experience with PHY 4G\5G background
  • Work with Linux environment
• B.Sc in Electrical Engineering/Communication Systems Engineering or Computer Science with strong relevant experience.

additionalPlain:
6+ years of experience in various protocols for interoperability, performance evaluation and troubleshooting issues of  radio access technology.
Hands on experience in using wireless test tools such as QXDM, TM500, Channel Emulator, etc.
Knowledge of message flows and parameters used in the messages for 5G NR procedures
Familiarity with scripting languages such as Python, Tcl

descriptionPlain:
People come to work at Parallel Wireless because we are building the future of telecom. They stay, because they are challenged and driven by an incredible product and team.  We take pride in our commitment to employee development, and our culture fosters an atmosphere of empowerment, trust, respect, and communication. Learn more about our mission, vision and values.

What you'll do:

5G QA Access 
Going through 3GPP standards, architecture and design documents to come up with thorough and in-depth test plans for testing 5G NR functionalities.
Creating test scripts using available test tools. This will involve getting familiarized with the test tools and figuring out innovative ways of re-creating practically possible scenarios.
Ability to build simple/complex test setups as per the requirements of the test cases
Creating test plans on 5G NR features by following 3GPP and ORAN standards
Executing test cases and validating the test status based on the expectations for the test case.
Ability to fully understand system logs, test tool logs and use this understanding for debugging issues and identifying accurate root causes for the problems seen on the system under test or in the network
Using the test expertise and identifying overall improvements and enhancements which are possible on the system
Debugging field log/data and identifying potential problems and re-creating the same in the lab
Other duties as assigned

lists.content:
• Algorithmic research considering the trade-offs between performance, implementation cost, real-time, and time-to-market.
  • Algorithms implementation from research to simulation level to an official release, including literature survey, Matlab/C modeling, specification document, escorting implementation & integration toward high-quality releases.

• At least 5 years of experience in PHY/RF algorithms development for wireless modems.
  • An independent problem solver with excellent mathematical and analytical skills.
  • Eager to learn and develop your professional skills in the field of wireless communications
  • Team player: Excellent communication skills, and ability to thrive in a global multi-site environment
  • Good understanding of the cellular standards (LTE/NR) – Advantage
  • Experience in implementation for vector processors –Advantage

• B.Sc in electrical engineering / computer science
  •  M.Sc / PhD with a major in communication theory and systems and/or signal processing -Advantage

lists.content:
• Minimum 5+ years of experience in Architecting and building complex tools and Automation frameworks from scratch using open-source tools and build on existing frameworks
  • Expert knowledge in Python and understanding of any two or more languages from  Perl, Tcl, C++
  • Familiarity with JSON API / RESTful HTTP
  • Familiarity with Kubernetes, ELK, Prometheus and Grafana Monitoring Tools
  • Strong experience in UNIX, preferably Linux at user and kernel level with in-depth knowledge of SQL.
  • A solid foundation in software engineering and programming.
  • Experience with Radio Access Network Technologies and a plus to have experience in LTE/3G/2G/WiFi/WiMax cellular networks
  • Experience with LAN/WAN, Routing protocols, TCP/IP, QoS, Tunneling and security protocols.
  • Solid understanding of Linux OS tools and utilities, wireless and Ethernet drivers
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills are required.
  • Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills
  • Ability to multi-task in a fast-paced environment

descriptionPlain:
People come to work at Parallel Wireless because we are building the future of telecom. They stay, because they are challenged and driven by an incredible product and team.  We take pride in our commitment to employee development, and our culture fosters an atmosphere of empowerment, trust, respect, and communication. Learn more about our mission, vision and values.

Parallel Wireless is an innovative company in the cellular small-cell business. We’re reimagining the architecture of the cellular network to address the existing challenges of bringing cellular coverage to unconnected areas (2G, 3G and 4G) and the future challenges coming with the evolution of 5G. We are a fast-moving, award-winning, amazing technology company, embracing ambitious innovation, cutting-edge technology and customers’ success. We’re looking for top talented, creative and ambitious candidates to join our exceptional team.

We have an end-to-end automation infrastructure, but we want to evolve it to a world-class level. We are looking for an automation system architect to define, design and help develop Parallel Wireless automation infrastructure.

lists.content:
• Own overall auto infra design and integration:
  • Overall system design and architecture
  • Collection and integration of requirements from the entire R&D org
  • Definition of big building blocks and major enhancements
  • Documentation of system and building blocks
  • Recommend and initiate system changes and refactoring
  • Review the code and design of the Automation Infra engineers
  • Help lead implementation of new/complicated/big modules/features in the most optimized and generic way
  • Mentorship & training to teammates and conduct training to other R&D members for ongoing improvement and use of correct tools and methodologies
  • Optimization
  • Review current architecture and tests flows in order to optimize them (duration, complexity, robustness, etc.)
  • Optimize and consolidate future requirements and enhancements
  • Innovation
  • Drive new tools/approaches/methodologies to the automation infra/team members
  • Drive innovative solutions to the infra: debug, BI, AI, etc.

• 7+ years of experience in Automationinfrastructure and at least 3 of them as a TL/PM
  • Excellent familiarity with automation solutions and tools
  • Experience with building automation frameworks and infrastructure
  • Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools and processes
  • Highly proactive - introducing new tools and technologies.
  • Strong hands-on design, coding, and debugging skills
  • Proven record of accomplishment of integrating automation into CI/CD pipelines
  • Excellent interpersonal skills
  • Accountable, taking end to end ownership as a personal trait
  • Proficiency in Python
  • Experience with Object Oriented Programming
  • Experience in tools development for testing environments - Advantage.
  • Experience in working with databases - Advantage
  • Good familiarity with cloud architecture –Advantage
• BS/MS degree in Computer Science or Engineering

lists.content:
• Must have strong communication skills, must be an effective team player, and be able to work independently in a global multi-site environment. 
  • Ability to translate communication standards/specification to efficient implementation. 
  • Experience in C/C++ development in the context of embedded systems. 
  • Proficient in design, documentation, implementation, debugging and unit testing of software components of a multi-threaded real-time/embedded system. 
  • Practical experience and knowledge of Linux architecture and Kernel drivers
  • Knowledge and experience with DPDK (including CRYPTODEV)

• Working experience in Docker, operating K8s based and cloud native deployments.
  • Working experience in virtualized environment with hands-on experience on Linux/KVM Hypervisors and Open Stack, VMware
  • Working experience in Python, Ansible, terraform and Shell Scripts
  • Working experience in operating, analyzing and troubleshooting large-scale distributed systems
  • Working experience with Unix/Linux operating systems internals and administration and networking (e.g., TCP/IP, routing, network topologies) – must
  • Working experience in one or more of the following: C, C++, Java, Python, Go, Perl, Ruby, or shell scripting – advantage
  • working experience in cloud native platform like AWS EKS & GCP GKE – advantage
  • Working experience of REST/SOAP API
  • Knowledge in wireless communication and familiarity with one of the cellular standards, i.e. 2G/3G/LTE/LTE-Advanced/5G-NR – advantage
  • Excellent communication skills, and ability to thrive in a global multi-site environment

additionalPlain:

Bachelor’s (B.E/B.Tech) or Master’s degree (M.E. or M.Tech.) in Electronics/Tele-Communication/Computer Science Engineering; or equivalent training, education and experience.

Job Description: 
We are looking for a Customer Support Engineer for remote network monitoring and KPI reporting with technical experience in the Radio Access Network.  As part of PW’s Customer Experience organization, this role would interface with PW’s service provider customers, as well as, PW Customer Support, Systems Engineering and Development teams.

Key Job Functions
Will be part of a 24x7 remote network monitoring team working on a rotating shift basis.
Responsible for KPI and technical reporting for the Customer Support team.
Collaborate with peer teams to identify their specific reporting requirements.
Deliver daily, weekly and monthly reports to internal teams.
Define and document methodologies and procedures for recurring reports.
Implement automations to reduce the report generation effort and to increase accuracy in the reporting results and information.
Assist with the presentation and explaining technical analysis, KPIs, Statistics and Root Cause Analysis to customers for their production environment and mission critical systems.
Understand system management on a wide range of network technologies including GSM, UMTS, LTE, LTE-Advanced and proprietary systems.
Perform first level technical support and analysis on issues found during network monitoring.
 
Job Requirements
3 to 7 years of hands-on technical support or similar experience in the Radio Access field of the mobile wireless industry.
Direct experience presenting and explaining detailed KPIs and metrics to Customers and internal company leadership.
Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to cultivate a motivated and cohesive team environment.
Must be able to work in 24x7 shift environment with a flexibility to work diverse schedule
Experience in RAN or RF a major plus
Experience in any one of the LTE, UMTS, GSM, WiFi and other Radio Access Technologies.
Experience with LAN/WAN, Routing protocols, TCP/IP, QoS, Tunneling and security protocols.
Unix/Linux systems knowledge.
Knowledgeable in wireless operator methods and practices.
Strong written and communications skills.
Ability to understand technical issues
A team player who works well with shared responsibilities
Ability to adapt quickly to changing environments and manage parallel time-critical tasks
Good understanding of 3GPP standards
Experience with Excel or other statistical analysis tools
Ability to multi-task in a fast-paced environment

descriptionPlain:
People come to work at Parallel Wireless because we are building the future of telecom. They stay, because they are challenged and driven by an incredible product and team.  We take pride in our commitment to employee development, and our culture fosters an atmosphere of empowerment, trust, respect, and communication. Learn more about our mission, vision and values.

We are looking for a talented and enthusiastic DevOps CI/CD automation engineer to help take our build, release, and feature development solutions to the next level.  Parallel Wireless engineers use state-of-the-art technologies, tools and automation systems along with their ingenuity to design advanced solutions. 
 
You will be part of the team responsible for CI/CD pipeline automation and innovation in a hybrid on premise/AWS OpenStack environment. Candidates must be well versed in docker, kubenetes as well as openstack to provide a state-of-the-art agile workflow. The DevOps team is responsible for leveraging automation to support Parallel Wireless growing global software development teams. This exciting opportunity will allow you to part of a DevOps automation development to solve real-world problems. Come join us!

lists.content:
• Skills:
  • 5+ years of experience in DevOps or other CI/CD automation engineering roles providing solutions for complex products that include various of software components including embedded.
  • Demonstrate ability to share knowledge across DevOps, Development, Testing and Infrastructure teams.
  • Strong experience using Jenkins for automated continuous integration and release engineering.
  • Strong expertise with Linux based development environments.
  • Experience with DevOps practices using git, Bitbucket, github, Atlassian tools suite, and Jenkins. 
  • Strong Experience with python, perl, shell scripts, or other scripting languages for use in automation and DevOps practices. 
  • Experience implementing and using automated processes to structure, simplify, and optimize workflows for merging, syncing and other tree maintenance activities. 
  • Ability to demonstrate competency and deep understanding of mature source code management models for feature and release branch development and merging/sync strategies.
  • Excellent written & verbal communication skills. 
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced team-oriented environment.
  •  Experience and knowledge in the following technologies is a plus (not required):
  • ·Agile software development mindset and understanding of more traditional methods of software development.

The Logistics officer/coordinator is responsible for managing domestic & international shipments, identifying trends across global transportation methods and practices, providing visibility through shipments/projects and tools, and ensuring that internal and external customers’ needs are met and that company policy and international trade compliance regulations are adhered to. 
 
NOTE: this person is likely to be located in the USA or that general region to cover/deal with other time zones of customer and supply chain partners.

lists.content:
• Responsible for On-Time Shipment for transportation 
  • Overcome roadblocks to ensure shipment is made in line with internal & external customers/project requirements. 
  • Well aware of export/import paperwork & permits 
  • Responsible for courier shipment domestic & internal, able to create the DHL, UPS, and FedEx labels and paperwork.
  • Knowledge of FZE & TIBs paperwork and inspections. 
  • Continuous internal communication with global pole managers/carriers 
  • Implementation of tools and dashboards for metric visibility and communication 
  • Coordinating and communicating shipment delivery requirements with freight forwarders 
  • Primary contact for global affiliates in reference to the logistics process 
  • Responsible for timely, accurate and complete record keeping 
  • Support standardization of transportation processes across the region 
  • Responsible for open orders to ship, and inform about the transit time to end customer and overseeing shipment until POD is obtained. 
  • Keeping the tracking of shipment and reporting transportation metrics 
  • Maintaining records of import and export shipments. 
  • Responsible for the paperwork to all the orders need to be with correct documents and properly labeled 
  • Ensure that warehousing, packaging and transportation requirements are met 
  • Partnership with the warehouse area to implement improvements in the process 
  • Biweekly calls with carriers to raise any concerns 
  • Good knowledge of Regularity certification, permit, and approvals.

• Demonstrated logistics leadership of multiple facilities in a similar industry 
  • Experience in logistics or supply chain modeling & simulation. 
  • Proven ability to meet deadlines in a fast-paced changing environment. 
  • Ability to work effectively in a cross-functional, global team environment. 
  • Willing to travel domestically up to 20% of the time. 
  • Experience with NetSuite ERP system a plus. 
  • Experience in high-tech industry; telecommunications a plus 
  • Strong initiative and perseverance 
  • Strong ambition for continuous learning, and willingness to take on additional responsibilities. 
  • Excellent communication skills both oral and written. 
  • Very proficient in MS suite of tools 
  • Ability to adapt and respond effectively to changes in situation or information.

• Bachelor's Degree and 2 years of experience working in logistics, engineering, or supply chain management; advanced degree and/or relevant professional certifications a plus  
  • Certification in DGR

additionalPlain:
Education 
Bachelor's Degree and 2 years of experience working in logistics, engineering, or supply chain management; advanced degree and/or relevant professional certifications a plus  Certification in DGR
 


Parallel Wireless is the leading U.S.-based company challenging the world’s legacy vendors with the industry’s only unified ALL G (5G/4G/3G/2G) software-enabled OpenRAN solutions. Its cloud-native OpenRAN and network architectures redefine network economics for global mobile operators in both coverage and capacity deployments, while also paving the way to 5G. Through open collaboration with the OpenRAN ecosystem partners, Parallel Wireless has created the world’s first and largest fully-compliant OpenRAN ecosystem that is capable of delivering next generation wireless infrastructure at a dramatically lower cost, ensuring more equal access to 5G across the globe. The company’s OpenRAN portfolio is designed to help customers modernize their networks, reduce deployment costs and complexity, increase operational efficiency, enable interoperability, find new revenue streams, and start deploying multi-vendor 5G networks today. The company’s customers include over 60 global mobile operators, as well as private and public industries and governments that use their software-defined network portfolio to reimagine their networks. Parallel Wireless's innovation and excellence in multi-technology, open virtualized RAN solutions have been recognized with 65+ industry awards. Please visit www.parallelwireless.com for more information.
 
Parallel Wireless embraces diversity and equality of opportunity. Please do not forward resumes to our jobs alias, Parallel Wireless employees or any other company location. Parallel Wireless is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes/applications.

description:
People come to work at Parallel Wireless because we are building the future of telecom. They stay, because they are challenged and driven by an incredible product and team.  We take pride in our commitment to employee development, and our culture fosters an atmosphere of empowerment, trust, respect, and communication. Learn more about our mission, vision and values.  

We are looking for an experienced Help Desk Technician to join our growing IT team. The individual must have willingness to learn and adopt new systems and applications.

lists.content:
• Serve as a representative for the IT Department for the customer service and support the resolution of all tickets.
  • Provide level I and II support for a dynamic organization.
  • Interface with end users and function as their primary point of contact for networking, hardware, and software issues throughout the life cycle.
  • Remediate users' computer issues in an effective, courteous, and expedient manner to ensure maximum productivity of local and remote staff.
  • Create new users and computers in Active Directory.
  • Perform and get approval for routine and non-routine change requests in Active Directory.
  • Support OSX / IOS / Android devices with MDM software
  • Escalate complex and high priority tickets to their appropriate points of escalation in tier III.
  • Perform further troubleshooting as requested by escalation points and provide users with timely updates.
  • Verify and document the resolution of support of all requests in the ticketing system.
  • Follow all appropriate policies, procedures, and SOPs for documenting support requests and problem tickets.
  • Abide by all relevant security policies and accompanying ISO standards.
  • Configure incoming hardware as well as set up workspaces for onsite users.
  • Fulfill new requests for hardware dispersals in a timely manner.
  •  Willingness to learn and adopt new systems.
  • Other duties and projects as assigned by manager.

• Excellent interpersonal and customer service skills
  • Must be willing and able to perform effectively in a fast-paced customer-centric environment
  • Strong notation skills and attention to detail
  • Demonstrated experience in troubleshooting
  • Ability to quickly learn and adopt new IT Support and Infrastructure software for hardware and user management.

• Associates, BA/BS in Information Technology or Computer Science OR commensurate certification and experience.
  • Strong experience in customer support.
  • Experienced in working with Windows 10
  • Experienced with hardware dispersal and refresh campaigns
  • Must have a good command of English in order to provide effective phone, touch, and email support
  • Ideal candidates will have experience supporting a  multisite environment with 500+ users.
  • Ideal candidates will have 3+ years’ experience in a Helpdesk Support role primarily in a Windows Environment utilizing Active Directory.
  • Ideal candidates will have 1 -2 years’ experience supporting OSX / IOS / Android devices
  • Advanced experience working with various Windows Server versions is a plus
  • Relevant Certifications (A+, MCSA, Security+, etc.) are a plus
  • Willingness to learn and adopt new systems and applications
  • Must be a USC

lists.content:
• Partners with the Director of HR to execute and support all annual HR processes
  • Manage benefits, leaves, on-boarding and off-boarding, terminations, and other HR programs that support employee development, team cohesion, and retention
  • Lead new hire orientations, benefits overview, HR systems overview, etc.
  • Update and maintain accuracy of employee records using HRIS system
  • Communicate the strategy behind, and rollout of, benefits programs, including annual open enrollment, and participate in benefits education campaigns and communications
  • Support efforts for annual benefits open enrollment, benefits fair, as well as planning of select employee events
  • Develop and administer training as needed (i.e. management training, harassment training, company policies, etc.).
  • Consult on employee questions and issues, ensuring confidentiality and consistency with company policy and practices, escalating to Director of HR as appropriate
  • Perform exit interviews and report on feedback as appropriate; primary point of contact for post-employment activities - COBRA, employment verifications, etc.
  • Consistently evaluate policies, processes and best practices within the department and company and partner with Director of HR to evolve and update as needed
  • Manage HR SharePoint, documentation upload, quarterly documentation/policy review, and manage upload of benefit renewal data.
  • Partner with Director of Human Resources to review ISO HR processes and documentation.

• Exemplary written, verbal and interpersonal communication skills.
  • Proactive and analytical with a customer service orientation, with the ability to communicate collaboratively and effectively with a diverse population.
  • Highly organized and detail-oriented, with the ability prioritize and manage multiple projects and initiatives.
  • HR Certifications a plus
  • Flexible, with the ability to resolve highly confidential, time-sensitive and complex issues independently and with sound judgment in a fast-paced environment.
  • Must be proficient with standard Microsoft Office programs, primarily Word and Excel
  • Prior experience with HRIS systems, preferably UKG/Ultipro.
  • Prior experience working in a global organization a plus

• BA
  • 3-5 years of experience

Parallel Wireless is the leading U.S.-based company challenging the world’s legacy vendors with the industry’s only unified ALL G (5G/4G/3G/2G) software-enabled OpenRAN solutions. Its cloud-native OpenRAN and network architectures redefine network economics for global mobile operators in both coverage and capacity deployments, while also paving the way to 5G. Through open collaboration with the OpenRAN ecosystem partners, Parallel Wireless has created the world’s first and largest fully-compliant OpenRAN ecosystem that is capable of delivering next generation wireless infrastructure at a dramatically lower cost, ensuring more equal access to 5G across the globe. The company’s OpenRAN portfolio is designed to help customers modernize their networks, reduce deployment costs and complexity, increase operational efficiency, enable interoperability, find new revenue streams, and start deploying multi-vendor 5G networks today. The company’s customers include over 60 global mobile operators, as well as private and public industries and governments that use their software-defined network portfolio to reimagine their networks. Parallel Wireless's innovation and excellence in multi-technology, open virtualized RAN solutions have been recognized with 65+ industry awards. Please visit www.parallelwireless.com for more information.

This is a hands-on position in a fast-paced startup environment with excellent opportunity for growth. This role will be supporting the overall inventory management needs of the company as well as providing materials support between the company and its supply chain partners.  This position will also require the ability to be proactive and to interact with all departments and levels of the organization. This is an outstanding growth opportunity for an energetic, detailed oriented, multi-tasking, self-starter who is proficient in material control and system tools, learns quickly and can thrive in a fast-paced environment.

This is a hands-on position in a fast-paced startup environment with excellent opportunity for growth. This role will be supporting the overall inventory management needs of the company as well as providing materials support between the company and its supply chain partners.  This position will also require the ability to be proactive and to interact with all departments and levels of the organization. This is an outstanding growth opportunity for an energetic, detailed oriented, multi-tasking, self-starter who is proficient in material control and system tools, learns quickly and can thrive in a fast-paced environment.

lists.content:
• Receives and distributes purchased items as necessary
  • Coordinate inventory transfers within the company and to/from supply chain partners
  • Performs related transactions within NetSuite business application system
  • Support company shipment activities as necessary
  • Conducts inventory cycle counts and periodic physical inventories, and reports results
  • Processes customer and supplier RMA’s
  • Organizes and maintains inventory stores ensuring compliance with 6S standards.
  • Interface with finance to reconcile accounts payables and receivables

• Strong analytical abilities and works well under pressure
  • Independent worker who can assess needs and determine priorities
  • High level of attention to detail, while operating in multi-tasking environment
  • Extensive use of Microsoft Excel & Word
  • Ability to quickly pick up computer-based inventory management and work order processing tools
  • Ability to lift packages weighing 50 pounds
  • Communicate effectively with individuals at all levels of the organization
  • Ability to work as a team member across functional groups and multiple priorities
  • Must have clear communication skills, both verbal and written
  • Associates degree and minimum 2 years’ experience in a materials control role
  • Previous experience in high tech environment
  • Previous experience in startup environment
  • Knowledgeable in international shipping, import/export requirements

• Provide ongoing administrative lab computer support to include administration, maintenance, and troubleshooting of Windows, Linux, and Mac machines.
  • Implement virtualization duties including set up and administration of virtual machines spanning UNIX, LINUX, WINDOWS operating systems.
  • Perform network administration including performing configuration of routers, switches (e.g. VLAN, DMZ, LAG), installing cable and rack equipment.
  • Create and maintain documents containing policies and procedures.
  • Perform user administration including coordinating access controls with users, program
  • leads, and management (e.g. permission change approvals) and providing password resets.
  • Maintain and support development infrastructure including deploying servers.
  • Perform hardware assembly, maintenance, debugging, and corrective actions (e.g. recover failed disks).
  • Department inventory and asset tracking.
  • Troubleshooting and triage of networks and interconnected systems.
  • Demonstrated mechanical aptitude with rack construction, hardware assembly
  • Laptops, Servers, Cell Phones – repair and prepare

• Minimum of 2 years’ experience working in a computer lab environment
  • Understanding of Dell Servers, HP servers, HP switching
  • Troubleshooting skills
  • Basic Linux administration skills
  • Telecommunications experience
  • Ability to work independently
  • Details oriented

What you will do - 

1. Deploy  applications in Kubernetes clusters
2. Follow software engineering best practices by estimating, documenting, and developing work products
3. Work in a fast-paced development environment applying advanced tools and technologies solving hard data engineering problems
4. Develop full-stack code in Python, Golang and Scala to develop applications and host in the containerized workload using micro-services.

7. Design, develop, and deliver TOOLS and product features for different G's and technologies
continuous support for product CI/CD working on cloud platform like AWS EKS & GCP GKE.

lists.content:
• Take an active role in the full development life cycle of PHY features, from initial design through to integration in an end-to-end system
  • Implement product features in C++, using all your skills to produce highly efficient solutions
  • Create and implement test plans to validate functional and compute performance (within our continuous integration environment)
  • Drive the system integration of new features, working with teams in UK, Israel, and India
  • Work within a well-equipped laboratory with state-of-the-art test tools – RF equipment, UE emulators, commercial UEs

• Strong C and/or C++ skills
  • Experience of real-time embedded software in the Linux environment
  • Knowledge of 4G or 5G Physical Layer
  • Experience with working in an integration/lab type environment
  • Python experience and advantage
  • Knowledge of Matlab/Octave an advantage
•    Bachelor or Master’s degree in Electrical/Computer/Communications Engineering or other relevant field.

additionalPlain:
* PHY: The physical layer, or PHY, is the part of a basestation which converts a bit stream into a modulated digital signal ready to be transmitted wirelessly, and in the reverse direction processes a wireless signal to recover the information (bit stream) contained within it. It is sometimes referred to as the modem.

descriptionPlain:
People come to work at Parallel Wireless because we are building the future of telecom. They stay, because they are challenged and driven by an incredible product and team.  We take pride in our commitment to employee development, and our culture fosters an atmosphere of empowerment, trust, respect, and communication. Learn more about our mission, vision and values.

We are looking for a talented and motivated PHY Software Intern Engineer Intern to join our team and develop physical layer (PHY*) solutions for our 4G and 5G products.
 
The position is a 12 months minimum internship at our office in the centre of Bristol, where you will be working alongside a team of approximately 30 people, part of a larger (300+) international R&D team motivated by building the future of telecoms.

We are looking for a talented and motivated PHY Software Intern Engineer Intern to join our team and develop physical layer (PHY*) solutions for our 4G and 5G products.
 
The position is a 12 months minimum internship at our office in the centre of Bristol, where you will be working alongside a team of approximately 30 people, part of a larger (300+) international R&D team motivated by building the future of telecoms.

lists.content:
• Contribute to the development of PHY software.
  • Test and debug tools and the integration and validation of base-station physical layer features on platforms using the latest Intel / ARM CPUs and state of the art radioheads.
  • Use wireless UE (mobile) emulators and RF signal generators and analysers.

• Experience of developing C/C++/Python in a modern software development environment (Linux, GIT, JIRA, Bitbucket) .
  • A solid experience of validating complex software projects in a real time linux environment.
  • Experience of operating equipment in a wireless laboratory, analyzing and presenting test results.
  • An understanding of modern wireless basestation architecture.

• Scripting (ideally Python) programming skills.
  • C or C++ knowledge.
  • An interest in hardware, understanding systems, and solving complex issues.
  • Exposure to signal processing or wireless software algorithms is an advantage but not a requirement.

text: PHY Software Engineer Intern - Test and Integration Team

additionalPlain:

lists.content:
• Interact with Customers and understand their requirements and constraints
  • Planning, Design, Implementation and support of Wireless Networks
  • Identify and troubleshoot hardware and software technical problems.
  • Conduct System and network analysis, problem solving and infrastructure planning
  • Understand Customer infrastructures, their needs and provide expertise and consulting solutions
  • Analyze system logs, performance issues and the production environment for mission critical systems.
  • Author and present customer facing presentations and written technical materials
  • Perform system analysis on a wide range of network technologies including 3G, LTE, LTE
  • Advanced and proprietary systems work independently and skilled at knowing when to utilize additional resources and escalate.
  • Define new system requirements based on customer interactions
  • Key contributor to developing product strategies

• Minimum 6 years’ of hands on Professional Service Engineering experience managing customers and their expectations
  • Experience in wireless industry
  • Hands on experience with installing and troubleshoot
  • Wireless Access Networks and Wireless Network Technologies.
  • Expert knowledge in various protocols for interoperability, performance evaluation and troubleshooting the issues.
  • Experience in RF Performance Analysis and Troubleshooting RF Issues is a major plus
  • Knowledge of 5G/LTE/UMTS/GSM (any one)
  • Experience with LAN/WAN, Routing protocols, TCP/IP, QoS, Tunneling and security protocols.
  • Knowledgeable in wireless operator methods and practices
  • Expert written and communications skills
  • Ability to troubleshoot issues and get into technical discussions with R&D
  • Established track record as a problem solver and effective team player
  • Ability to adapt quickly to changing environments and manage parallel
  • Time critical tasks
  • Good understanding of 3GPP standards
  • Ability to multi- task in a fast paced environment
  • Understanding and working on Linux platforms is a must.
  • Networking knowledge is a must. 
  • 5G knowledge is a plus
  • Cloud infrastructure work is a plus

lists.content:
• Review requirements, specifications, and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback and implement the same in testing.
  • Create detailed, comprehensive, and well-structured test plans and test cases for 5G technologies as per 3GPP specifications and execution of the same.
  • Design and build end-to-end test setups based on the test requirements.
  • Analyze and debug logs for test simulators and systems under test during the test cycle.
  • Resolve issues in end-to-end setups (For Ex: UE/mobile issues, RF/fiber connectivity, etc.)
  • Analyze, reproduce and validate customer-found defects.
  • Verify various Parallel Wireless Products and Applications for Functional, Stability, Performance, and User experience aspects based on Customer Use cases.
  • Suggest improvements and changes to the product in order to improve customer experience.

• +5 years of relevant professional experience.
  • Good understanding of architecture, call flows and design for testing 4G/5G access technologies.
  • Thorough understanding of 3GPP standards covering PHY, MAC, PDCP, RLC, RRC, S1AP and X2AP protocols
  • Ability to create test scripts as per the requirements and execute the same with both in-house and standard test tools (Ex: Azimuth, TM500, Amarisoft, network/spectrum analyzers, etc).
  • Experience with LAN/WAN, WLAN, Routing protocols – L2 and L3, TCP/IP, QoS
  • Knowledge of Linux/UNIX based platforms.
  • Knowledge of handling and troubleshooting User Equipment (Mobiles), SIM installation, etc.
  • Good understanding of virtualization platforms like VMware, KVM, etc.
  • Experience in using test management and bug tracking tools (Ex: JIRA)
• Knowledge on OpenStack, Docker and Kubernetes technologies
• Bachelor's or master’s degree in Electrical/Electronic/Communications/Computer Science Engineering.

lists.content:
• Review requirements, specifications and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback
  • System test and test result updating in timely manner. 
  • Ready to learn new wireless access technologies.
  • Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases
  • Estimate, prioritize, plan and coordinate testing activities
  • Design, develop and execute automation scripts using open source tools 
  •  Identify, record, document thoroughly and track bugs 
  • Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved 
  • Develop and apply testing processes for new and existing products to meet client needs 
  • Work closely with internal teams (e.g. developers and product managers) to identify system requirements 
  • Monitor debugging process results.
  • Track quality assurance metrics, like defect densities and open defect counts 
  • Stay up-to-date with new testing tools and test strategies

• Good experience in Platform and 4G
  • 5-7years of relevant experience will be required.
  • Knowledge of scripting languages from Python, Perl 
  • Good understanding on UMTS/LTE/GSM air interface concepts, calls flows and protocols
  • Basic exposure to NodeB-UE functional testing with E2E understanding and working with UEs and core 
  • Good knowledge on protocols – RRM, RRC, RLC, MAC, RANAP, S1AP, NAS 
  • Experience with LAN/WAN, routing protocols, TCP/IP, QoS, Tunneling and security protocols.  Excellent verbal and written communication skills are required 
  • Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills 
  • Ability to multi-task in a fast-paced environment 
  • Ability to adapt quickly to changing environments and manage parallel time-critical tasks 
  • Good understanding of 3GPP standards 
  • Ability to multi-task in a fast-paced environment 
  • Ability to travel as needed
  • Must be a US Citizen
• Bachelor’s (B.E/B.Tech) or Master’s degree (M.E. or M.Tech.) in Electronics/Communication/Computer Science Engineering or equivalent training, education and experience.

lists.content:
• Planning, Design, Implementation and support of Wireless Networks.
  • Identify and troubleshoot hardware and software technical problems.
  • Conduct System and network analysis, problem solving and infrastructure planning.
  • Understand Customer infrastructures, their needs and provide expertise and consulting solutions.
  • Analyze system logs, performance issues and the production environment for key functionality at L2/L3 messaging and L1 optimization.
  • Author and present customer-facing presentations and written technical materials.
  • Perform system analysis on a wide range of network technologies including 2G, 3G, LTE, LTE-Advanced and proprietary systems.
  • Work independently and skilled at knowing when to utilize additional resources and escalate.
  • Define new system requirements based on customer interactions.
  • Key contributor to developing product strategies.

• Minimum 6 years’ of hands-on Systems Engineering experience in wireless industry.
  • Hands on experience with installing and troubleshoot Wireless Access Networks and Wireless Network Technologies.
  • Expert knowledge in various protocols for interoperability, performance evaluation and troubleshooting the issues.
  • Experience in RF Performance Analysis tools including Link Budgets, Planet, Wincatcher, QXDM, Xcal, Nemo, QCAT, Spectrum Analyzers.
  • Experience in many of the LTE, UTMS, Wi-Fi and other Radio Access Technologies.
  • Experience with LAN/WAN, Routing protocols, TCP/IP, QoS, Tunneling and security protocols.
  • Knowledgeable in wireless operator deployment methods and practices.
  • Expert written and communications skills.
  • Ability to troubleshoot issues and get into technical discussions with R&D.
  • Established track record as a problem solver and effective team player
  • Ability to adapt quickly to changing environments and manage parallel time-critical tasks
  • Good understanding of 3GPP standards particularly to call flows
  • Ability to multi-task in a fast-paced environment
  • Ability to Travel as needed

description:
People come to work at Parallel Wireless because we are building the future of telecom. They stay, because they are challenged and driven by an incredible product and team.  We take pride in our commitment to employee development, and our culture fosters an atmosphere of empowerment, trust, respect, and communication. We are looking for a Cellular Communication Security Architect to join our Architecture growing team.

lists.content:
• Define the end-to-end security strategy for all products:  identify & address potential security risks   
  • Design, build and prototype world-class security systems for Telco environment  
  • Engage in Software Development Lifecycle to collaboratively ensure new products, platforms, and technologies meet or exceed security engineering requirements
  • Identify and communicate current and emerging security threats; Identify security design gaps in existing product and proposed architectures and recommend changes or enhancements
  • Define requirements (System Requirements Specification) and create solutions that balance business requirements with information and cyber security requirements
  • Write code for prototyping needs, simulation, testing and debugging of the desired security concepts
  • Be responsible for overall security requirements for All cellular technologies standards.
  • Champion security best practices, internally, with partners and vendors, and with customers.
  • Support third-party (customer and independent security test agencies) assessments of the company’s solution security in both commercial and government applications.

• BsC or MsC in computer science electrical eng. or similar  
  • 10+ Years’ Experience defining & implementing security solutions.
  • Strong working knowledge of IT risks, cyber security, and computer operating software
  • Experience within cloud platforms such as AWS, OpenStack and Kubernetes to design and build Cloud-native Open-RAN Telco products
  • Advanced understanding of security protocols, cryptography, and security
  • Knowledge in networking and communication security like TLS, IPSec, HTTPS
  • Excellent Communication (written and verbal) & interpersonal skills 

    • Advantage: 
  • Knowledge of 2G, 4G and 5G standards .
  • Previous Government/DoD/DARPA project experience

lists.content:
• 2 to 6 years of QA experience in IPSEC protocol and Software testing  
  • Proven track record on 4G/5G/3GPP/ORAN feature/functional test activities
  • High Availability and Performance Testing of Base Band Units/BBU (EnodeB, gNB), Core/simulated core
  • Analysis and interpretation of wireshark tracing to debug issues
  • Proven track record on 3GPP/ORAN feature/functional test activities
  • Automation(Robot framework/Python) is an added advantage
  • Hands on knowledge on protocols Networking/routing protocols IKE, IPSEC, IPSEC over GRE, NAT, 
  • CMPv2, SCEP, OCSP(Understanding on Networking and routing is must)
  • Networking certification like CCNA is preferrable
  • Testing experience in  PKI and understand of  X.509 Digital Certificates
  • Tools/Test Equipment usage: IXIA, Iperf, Traffic generator, CA Server/InstaCertifier, Channel Modelling, MOS Score Test Education:

lists.content:
• Be responsible for SW related aspect of the RAN Intelligent Controller, including SW architecture definition, integration aspects, problems troubleshooting, POCs development to demonstrate proposed solution (hand-on & coding)
  • Translate architecture needs and requirement into a system requirement specification
  • Define a cost-effective architecture that support RIC scaling (higher volume of cellular base stations and verity of xApp/rApp supported by the RIC), based performance analysis of utilization and CPU resources
  • Develop a POC (Hands-on and coding) to demonstrate the proposed architecture
  • Be active/ monitor RIC aspects at the O-RAN alliance and take part in relevant open SW community as needed      
  • Define SW architecture that supports RIC roadmap and different deployment scenarios

• BsC or MsC in computer science electrical eng. or similar 
  • Experience in SW architecture and in cloud native SW development/architecture
  • Experience with Linux-based platforms
  • Strong Knowledge of IP network services and protocols
  • Architectural and hands-on knowledge and hands-on proficiency and experience designing, deploying and managing Kubernetes
  • Experience with containerization packaging, tooling, and DevOps methodologies

• Familiar with O-RAN specifications and O-RAN Components – a huge advantage
  • Knowledge/ Experience in 2G 4G and 5G Radio network architecture and ecosystem
  • Knowledgeable with Radio Access Network (RAN) design and RAN virtualization
  • Knowledgeable with real-time OS and acceleration products and technologies
  • Experience in management and orchestration for distributed federated edge K8S clusters including Helm Configmap etc.
  • Ability to drive PoCs, and pilots
  • Solid understanding of computer networking and protocols.

lists.content:
• Review requirements, specifications, and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback and implement the same in testing.
  • Create detailed, comprehensive, and well-structured test plans and test cases for 5G technologies as per 3GPP specifications and execution of the same.
  • Design and build end-to-end test setups based on the test requirements.
  • Analyze and debug logs for test simulators and systems under test during the test cycle.
  • Resolve issues in end-to-end setups (For Ex: UE/mobile issues, RF/fiber connectivity, etc.)
  • Analyze, reproduce and validate customer-found defects.
  • Verify various Parallel Wireless Products and Applications for Functional, Stability, Performance, and User experience aspects based on Customer Use cases 
  • Suggest improvements and changes to the product in order to improve customer experience

• 7+ years of relevant professional experience.
  • Good understanding of architecture, call flows and design for testing 5G access technologies.
  • Thorough understanding of 3GPP standards covering PHY, MAC, PDCP, RLC, RRC, S1AP and X2AP protocols
  • Ability to create test scripts as per the requirements and execute the same with both in-house and standard test tools (Ex: Azimuth, TM500, Amarisoft, network/spectrum analyzers, etc).
  • Experience with LAN/WAN, WLAN, Routing protocols – L2 and L3, TCP/IP, QoS
  • Knowledge of Linux/UNIX based platforms.
  • Knowledge of handling and troubleshooting User Equipment (Mobiles), SIM installation, etc.
  • Good understanding of virtualization platforms like VMware, KVM, etc.
  • Experience in using test management and bug tracking tools (Ex: JIRA)
• Knowledge on OpenStack, Docker and Kubernetes technologies
• Bachelor’s or master’s degree in Electrical/Electronic/Communications/Computer Science Engineering.
• Kinneret Area, Israel

Bachelors (B.E/B.Tech) or Masters degree (M.E. or M.Tech.) in Computer Science/Electronics/Electronics & Telecommunication Engineering or equivalent training, education and experience.

Job Location
Bangalore


Parallel Wireless is the leading U.S.-based company challenging the world’s legacy vendors with the industry’s only unified ALL G (5G/4G/3G/2G) software-enabled OpenRAN solutions. Its cloud-native OpenRAN and network architectures redefine network economics for global mobile operators in both coverage and capacity deployments, while also paving the way to 5G. Through open collaboration with the OpenRAN ecosystem partners, Parallel Wireless has created the world’s first and largest fully-compliant OpenRAN ecosystem that is capable of delivering next generation wireless infrastructure at a dramatically lower cost, ensuring more equal access to 5G across the globe. The company’s OpenRAN portfolio is designed to help customers modernize their networks, reduce deployment costs and complexity, increase operational efficiency, enable interoperability, find new revenue streams, and start deploying multi-vendor 5G networks today. The company’s customers include over 60 global mobile operators, as well as private and public industries and governments that use their software-defined network portfolio to reimagine their networks. Parallel Wireless's innovation and excellence in multi-technology, open virtualized RAN solutions have been recognized with 65+ industry awards. Please visit www.parallelwireless.com for more information.
 
Parallel Wireless embraces diversity and equality of opportunity. We are committed to building inclusive and diverse teams representing all backgrounds, with a wide range of perspectives, and empowering industry-leading skills. We welcome and consider applications to join our team from all qualified candidates, regardless of their characteristics. We comply with all applicable laws and regulations on non-discrimination in employment (and recruitment), as well as work authorization and employment eligibility verification requirements.
 
Parallel Wireless does not accept unsolicited resumes or applications from agencies or individuals. Please do not forward resumes to our jobs alias, Parallel Wireless employees or any other company location. Parallel Wireless is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes/applications.

descriptionPlain:
People come to work at Parallel Wireless because we are building the future of telecom. They stay, because they are challenged and driven by an incredible product and team.  We take pride in our commitment to employee development, and our culture fosters an atmosphere of empowerment, trust, respect, and communication. Learn more about our mission, vision and values.


Job Responsibilities:
Have  1-2Y experience with software testing methodologies and automation technologies (tools and programming languages).
Have experience on 4G or 5G test methodology(end-to-end networks and nodes)
Have good experience of Understanding of RAN architecture and its working model
Programming knowledge of Python(preferred). Have experience on different Automation Frameworks.
Hands-on experience in Amarisoft/TM500 Emulators testing, validation equipment & Automating them
Troubleshoot, create, debug automated test cases
Understand failures and their impact on user experience and system stability.
Identify innovative ways to automate/simulate test plans, execute automated tests, and communicate results.
Able to communicate well within the software environment
Basic understanding of Linux OS internals, TCP/IP, multi-threading
Excellent verbal and written communication skills are required

additionalPlain:
What you will do :

Deploy ACS applications in Kubernetes clusters
Follow software engineering best practices by estimating, documenting, and developing work products
Work in a fast-paced development environment applying advanced tools and technologies solving hard data engineering problems
Develop full-stack code in Python, Golang and Scala to develop applications and host in the containerized workload using micro-services
Taking the ownership of the project and work with cross functional teams to successful delivery of the project.
Understanding of end to end scenario and troubleshooting/fixing of field and QA reported issues
Design, develop, and deliver TOOLS and product features for different G's and technologies
continuous support for product CI/CD
working on cloud platform like AWS EKS & GCP GKE

Review requirements, specifications, and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback and implement the same in testing.

Suggest improvements and changes to the product in order to improve customer experience

lists.content:
• Day to Day administration of IT Services tools such as: OKTA, AWS, Active Directory, Windows server, Linux administration,Virtualziation  Vault, Zabbix, Grafana, Prometheus, kubernetes and network equipment (Firewalls, switches, access points)
  • Primary lead for the IT team on Development automation tools for the Israel and other sites in EMEA
  • Troubleshoot day to day issues including critical server/OS level problems, project, system permissions, JVM performance tuning and application configuration
  • New hires account creation and equipment setup
  • Monitoring and capacity planning
  • Install, configure, and maintain server, switching and firewall infrastructure
  • Management of IT service tools such as
  • Managing tickets globally through our helpdesk system.
  • Works with other functional IT areas to ensure that IT best practices, policies and procedures are adhered to
  • Performs other IT-related tasks as required

• Five plus years of experience as a system administrator/infrastructure administrator
  • Working knowledge of DNS, DHCP, Active Directory, PKI
  • Working knowledge of Palo Alto, and HP/Aruba platforms.
  • Experience in storage and backup solutions
  • Experience in writing scripts in a familiar language such as python, bash, PowerShell
  • Working knowledge of Windows and Linux operating systems
  • Hands on Experience managing web application & VM’s hosted in a cloud environment like AWS
  • Familiar with CI/CD concepts and commonly used tools (Artifactory, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, Packer, development pipeline)
  • Able to work with minimum supervision and be self-motivated
  • Strong interpersonal, organizational, and problem-solving skills
  • Must be willing to work in a global environment and outside normal business hours when needed

lists.content:
• Planning, Design, Integration and support of Wireless Networks.
  • Identify and troubleshoot hardware and software technical problems.
  • Execute lab and field ATP
  • Conduct System and network analysis, problem solving and infrastructure planning.
  • Understand Customer infrastructures, their needs and provide expertise and consulting solutions.
  • Analyze system logs, performance issues and the production environment for mission critical systems.
  • Author and present customer-facing presentations and written technical materials.
  • Perform system analysis on a wide range of network technologies including 3G, 4G, 5G and proprietary systems.
  • Work independently and skilled at knowing when to utilize additional resources and escalate.
  • Define new system requirements based on customer interactions.
  • Key contributor to developing product strategies.

• Minimum 5 years’ of hands-on experience in QA or Systems Engineering on mobile radio/core nodes
  • Experience in wireless industry in Service Provider or Vendor domain. Mobility Access Networks and Network Technologies.
  • Ability to learn fast & adapt in daily work
  • Experience in any one or more of the LTE, UMTS, GSM and other Radio Access Technologies.
  • Experience in one or more virtualization technologies like KVM, Openstack and VMware.
  • Experience and understanding of Cloud Native principles with hands on with Dockers, Kubernetes etc. will be a plus.
  • Experience with LAN/WAN, Routing protocols, TCP/IP, QoS, Tunneling and security protocols is a plus
  • Knowledge of 3GPP specifications for Access and Core interfaces/Protocol. 
  • Knowledgeable in-Service Provider methods and practices
  • Expert written and communications skills
  • Established track record as a problem solver and effective team player
  • Ability to adapt quickly to changing environments and manage parallel Time critical tasks
  • Understanding of RF test tools like NEMO, TEMS, QXDM, Windcatcher etc is a plus
  • Ability to multi- task in a fast-paced environment
  • Flexible to travel within and outside India which involves upto 60-70% based on project requirement

• Bachelor’s (B.S) or Master’s degree (M.A. or M.S.) in Engineering; or equivalent training, education and experience.
  • job location : pune

Education
• Bachelor’s (BE/BTech) or Master’s degree (ME/Mtech ) in Engineering; or equivalent training, education and experience.

  • Conduct System and network analysis, problem solving and infrastructure planning.
  • Understand Customer infrastructures, their needs and provide expertise and consulting solutions.
  • Analyze system logs, performance issues and the production environment for mission critical systems.
  • Author and present customer-facing presentations and written technical materials.
  • Perform system analysis on a wide range of network technologies including 3G, LTE, LTE-Advanced and proprietary systems.
  • Work independently and skilled at knowing when to utilize additional resources and escalate.
  • Define new system requirements based on customer interactions.
  • Key contributor to developing product strategies.

• Minimum 0- 2 years’ of hands-on QA or System engineering
  • Hands on experience with installing and troubleshoot Wireless Access Networks and Wireless Network Technologies.
  • Knowledge in various protocols for interoperability, performance evaluation and troubleshooting the issues.
  • Knowledge of RF tools and usage
  • Knowledge of the LTE, UTMS, Wi-Fi and other Radio Access Technologies.
  • Basic knowledge of LAN/WAN, Routing protocols, TCP/IP, QoS, Tunneling and security protocols.
  • Expert written and communications skills.
  • Ability to troubleshoot issues and get into technical discussions with R&D.
  • Ability to adapt quickly to changing environments and manage parallel time-critical tasks
  • Ability to multi-task in a fast-paced environment
  • Ability to Travel as needed

additionalPlain:
Parallel Wireless is the leading U.S.-based company challenging the world’s legacy vendors with the industry’s only unified ALL G (5G/4G/3G/2G) software-enabled OpenRAN solutions. Its cloud-native OpenRAN and network architectures redefine network economics for global mobile operators in both coverage and capacity deployments, while also paving the way to 5G. Through open collaboration with the OpenRAN ecosystem partners, Parallel Wireless has created the world’s first and largest fully-compliant OpenRAN ecosystem that is capable of delivering next generation wireless infrastructure at a dramatically lower cost, ensuring more equal access to 5G across the globe. The company’s OpenRAN portfolio is designed to help customers modernize their networks, reduce deployment costs and complexity, increase operational efficiency, enable interoperability, find new revenue streams, and start deploying multi-vendor 5G networks today. The company’s customers include over 60 global mobile operators, as well as private and public industries and governments that use their software-defined network portfolio to reimagine their networks. People come to work at Parallel Wireless because we are building the future of telecom. They stay, because they are challenged and driven by an incredible product and team.  We take pride in our commitment to employee development, and our culture fosters an atmosphere of empowerment, trust, respect, and communication. Learn more about our mission, vision and values.

We are looking for a System Integration Engineer to deliver innovative functionalities to our customers and optimize our next-generation of Open-RAN base-station products in LTE and 5G NR Cellular Networks.

lists.content:
• Contribute to review the design of new radio cellular features (e.g. rate adaptation, power control, scheduler, interference mitigation), Challenge the implemented solutions, and suggest improvements. 
  • Define a test strategy to evaluate their end-to-end performances and ensure their conformance to Design and to Technology Specifications (Open RAN, 3GPP). 
  • Take ownership of features from an early stage of Proof of Concept, then during their SW implementation and release to customers. 
  • Deliver technical reports and Performance figures based on lab experiments to Product and Customer teams and provide Instructions to Automation teams. 
  • Handle and debug cellular systems issues reported from internal labs or observed in the field by customers.

• Fast learner and ability to grasp in details LTE and 5G standards. 
  • Knowledge of wireless communication theory. Familiarity with at least one of the cellular standards, i.e. 2G/3G/LTE/LTE-Advanced/5G-NR. 
  • Product and Customer oriented, with high curiosity for Innovative solutions. 
  • Experienced system engineer, including specification definition, verification, SW development methodologies. 
  • Hands-on experience in Networking, Cloud Computing and Linux. 
  • Excellent communication skills, and ability to thrive in a global multi-site environment. 
  • Fluent English
• B.Sc with a major in communication theory and systems and/or signal processing.

What You'll Do:
Conceptualize, plan, develop and write documentation sets, including complex technical material, with limited or no supervision. 
Identify, plan for, and revise technical writing project requirements, and research complex source material for documentation projects. 
Collaborate with cross-functional teams such as TAC, engineering, test, product marketing and other documentation teams to produce accurate, high quality documentation for our customers. 
Help identify and implement standards and process improvements to improve product documentation and productivity. 
Attend and contribute to product/project team meetings.
Serve as the lead writer for complex projects and ensure that projects are completed on schedule.
Participate in planning and design, and contribute to the project from end to end with minimal supervision.
Work with editors and technical resources to improve documentation quality and usability. 
Exhibit excellent analytical and problem solving skills.
Exhibit leadership skills and ability to mentor and supervise junior writers.

Attend and contribute to product/project team meetings.
Serve as the lead writer for complex projects and ensure that projects are completed on schedule.
Participate in planning and design, and contribute to the project from end to end with minimal supervision.
Work with editors and technical resources to improve documentation quality and usability. 
Exhibit excellent analytical and problem solving skills.
Exhibit leadership skills and ability to mentor and supervise junior writers.

lists.content:
• Who You'll Work With:
  • The Customer Support team at Parallel Wireless, which supports all customers of PW for Telecom products and service
  • Who You Are:
  • The Technical Documentation team is seeking technical writers with relevant experience of 10-15 years. This is an exciting time to be a part of the Parallel Wireless Tech Pubs group as it is marching towards new and innovative telecom solution in 5G domain.
  • Business/Technical Knowledge, Skills, and Expertise:
  • Good proficiency in networking technology and a thorough understanding of technical writing and project management.
  • Experience in producing user documentation including PRDs, FRDs, Pre-sales documentations, installation guides, configuration guides, CLI guides and Online Help documentation.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills. 
  • Strong working knowledge and application of style guides and industry practices.
  • Well-versed with Agile and Waterfall methods of product documentation and DDLC.
  • Ability to work under pressure to meet frequent deadlines. 
  • A self-starter possessing excellent research skills and enjoys working hands on with the product. 
  • Ability to partner with training developers and leverage common information to help create complementary documentation. 
  • Ability to learn new product, technology, and tools quickly, and mentor junior writers.
  • Knowledge of using XML-based authoring tools, such as XMetaL and FrameMaker.
  • Knowledge of DITA and working knowledge of content management systems.

additionalPlain:
Parallel Wireless is the leading U.S.-based company challenging the world’s legacy vendors with the industry’s only unified ALL G (5G/4G/3G/2G) software-enabled OpenRAN solutions. Its cloud-native OpenRAN and network architectures redefine network economics for global mobile operators in both coverage and capacity deployments, while also paving the way to 5G. Through open collaboration with the OpenRAN ecosystem partners, Parallel Wireless has created the world’s first and largest fully-compliant OpenRAN ecosystem that is capable of delivering next generation wireless infrastructure at a dramatically lower cost, ensuring more equal access to 5G across the globe. descriptionPlain:
People come to work at Parallel Wireless because we are building the future of telecom. They stay, because they are challenged and driven by an incredible product and team.  We take pride in our commitment to employee development, and our culture fosters an atmosphere of empowerment, trust, respect, and communication. Learn more about our mission, vision and values.

What you will do :

1.Deploy ACS applications in Kubernetes clusters
2.Follow software engineering best practices by estimating, documenting, and developing work products
3.Work in a fast-paced development environment applying advanced tools and technologies solving hard data engineering problems
4.Develop full-stack code in Python,  Golang and Scala to develop applications and host in the containerized workload using micro-services
5.Taking the ownership of the project and work with cross functional teams to successful delivery of the project.
6.Understanding of end to end scenario and troubleshooting/fixing of field and QA reported issues
7.Design, develop, and deliver TOOLS and product features for different G's and technologies
continuous support for product CI/CD working on cloud platform like AWS, EKS & GCP GKE.

The role of Technical Lead (QA) is to contribute to the testing of wireless telecom and cloud-based solutions of parallel wireless.
The work location is in Nashua, NH and would involve working with the test engineers across other parallel wireless sites in addition to the local team in Nashua, NH. This offers an opportunity to learn and contribute to the ORAN wireless technology.

lists.content:
• Review requirements, specifications, and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback and implement the same in testing.
  • Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases for LTE/5G technologies as per 3GPP specifications and execution of the same.
  • Design and build end to end test setups based on the test requirements.
  • Analyze the debug logs for test simulators and system under test and identify issues during the test cycle.
  • Resolve issues in end-to-end setups (For Ex: UE/mobile issues, cabling, RF/fiber connectivity, etc.) with minimal supervision.
  • Analyze, reproduce and validate customer found defects.

• Bachelor’s or master’s degree in Electrical/Electronic/Communications/Computer Science Engineering.
  • 10+ years of relevant professional experience.
  • Good understanding of architecture, call flows and design for testing LTE/5G access technologies.
  • Thorough understanding of 3GPP standards covering PHY, MAC, PDCP, RLC, RRC, S1AP and X2AP protocols.
  • Ability to create test scripts as per the requirements and execute the same with both in-house and standard test tools (Ex: Azimuth, TM500, Amarisoft, network/spectrum analyzers, etc.).
  • Strong knowledge of LAN/WAN networks, TCP/IP protocols, Ethernet cabling, basic IP addressing/routing, and networking.
  • Knowledge of Linux/UNIX based platforms.
  • Knowledge of handling and troubleshooting User Equipment's (Mobiles), SIM installation, etc.
  • Good understanding of virtualization platforms like VMware, KVM, etc.
  • Must be able to multi-task and work in a fast-paced environment. Need to be self-motivating and driven. Ability to Iearn quickly, perform tasks with moderate supervision, and have strong debug skills.
  • Experience in using test management and bug tracking tools (Ex: JIRA)
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

• Knowledge on OpenStack, Docker and Kubernetes technologies.
  • Familiarity with scripting languages such as Python, Tcl
  • Familiarity with SON functionalities.

Active involvement in Development for Hetnetgateway


Parallel Wireless is the leading U.S.-based company challenging the world’s legacy vendors with the industry’s only unified ALL G (5G/4G/3G/2G) software-enabled OpenRAN solutions. Its cloud-native OpenRAN and network architectures redefine network economics for global mobile operators in both coverage and capacity deployments, while also paving the way to 5G. Through open collaboration with the OpenRAN ecosystem partners, Parallel Wireless has created the world’s first and largest fully-compliant OpenRAN ecosystem that is capable of delivering next generation wireless infrastructure at a dramatically lower cost, ensuring more equal access to 5G across the globe. The company’s OpenRAN portfolio is designed to help customers modernize their networks, reduce deployment costs and complexity, increase operational efficiency, enable interoperability, find new revenue streams, and start deploying multi-vendor 5G networks today. The company’s customers include over 60 global mobile operators, as well as private and public industries and governments that use their software-defined network portfolio to reimagine their networks. Parallel Wireless's innovation and excellence in multi-technology, open virtualized RAN solutions have been recognized with 65+ industry awards. Please visit www.parallelwireless.com for more information.

People come to work at Parallel Wireless because we are building the future of telecom. lists.content:
• CNI [ container network interface ] such as Calico/Flannel and resource such as deployments/services – advantage.
  • Experience with Network Function Virtualization (NFV) – advantage
  • Proficiency in writing yamls files or helm charts, operators – advantage
  • Understanding of computer networking and protocols – advantage
  • Knowledge in wireless communication and familiarity with one of the cellular standards, i.e. 2G/3G/LTE/5G-NR – advantage
  • Linux Kernel programming and RT patches – advantage
  • Experience with real-time programming – advantage.
  • Knowledge and experience with DPDK – advantage
  • CLOUD ARCHITECTURE – advantage
  • 5+ years of experience in self-organizing networks (SON) or cell planning in 2G, 3G or 4G/5G
  • 3+ years of experience in object-oriented programming (C++, Python, go)
  • 7 years in the industry
  • Experience in Micro services and K8S
  • Experience with REST API
  • Experience with  REDIS\INFLUX DB

• Strong communication skills. 
  • Effective team player. 
  • Ability to work independently in a global multi-site organization. 
  • Embedded software experience is desired but not required. 
  • Good understanding of communication protocols – Advantage.
• BA in Science in Electrical or Telecommunication Engineering
